mintByRole(address,uint256,uint256,bytes.details: Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`, of token type `id`. See {ERC1155-_mint}. Requirements: - the caller must have MINTER_ROLE.

devdoc.title: ERC1155 - Mint as role - with meta transactions

userdoc.notice: Allow minting for grantees of MINTER_ROLE with meta-transactions supported via ERC2771.
